thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Olav Thon Eiendomsselskap Issues Additional NOK 100 Million Senior Secured Bond

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Olav Thon Eiendomsselskap Issues Additional NOK 100 Million Senior Secured Bond
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - OLAV THON EIENDOMSSELSKAP ASA:
* OUTSTANDING VOLUME AFTER TRANSACTION IS NOK 300 MILLION * HANDELSBANKEN CAPITAL MARKETS ACTED AS MANAGER FOR ISSUANCE
* COMPANY WILL BUY BACK NOK 100 MILLION OF OLT90 WITH ISIN NO0010776081 MATURING 18 OCT 2019
* OUTSTANDING AMOUNT IN OLT90 WILL BE NOK 400 MILLION AFTER BUY BACK.
* HAS ISSUED ADDITIONAL NOK 100 MILLION WITH MATURITY 13 MARCH 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
